name: com.charsui.texturepreviewer
description: To address the issue where Unity's default Inspector cannot zoom in to confirm the details of a compressed texture, you can use Texture Previewer to solve this problem. It supports modifying the background color, zoom level, mouse wheel zooming, refocusing, and reloading.

samples.description: Provide an Inspector extension that allows you to quickly open Texture Previewer by clicking the preview button at the bottom of the texture's Inspector.
